product_name: Pearl Izumi Attack Bike Knickers - Men's
long_description: No matter the forecast, the Pearl Izumi Attack bike knickers let you get out and ride-moisture management and a UPF shield on sunny days, warmth and wind protection on cool days. Select Transfer fabric quickly wicks sweat away, keeping you comfortable when the mercury rises. Race 3D chamois uses 4-way stretch technology to reduce friction, wick moisture and target cushioning in key areas. Pressure Relief Technology in chamois alleviates pressure points and encourages blood flow. Silicone leg grippers stretch without constricting and hold tights comfortably in place. UPF 50+ sun-protective fabric protects your legs. Low-profile, flatlock seams won't rub or chafe. Reflective elements on the Pearl Izumi Attack knickers make sure you're visible in low light.
